item.title: Samsung Chromebook Plus Demo at CES 2017
item.description: This video is a quick hands on the Samsung Chromebook Plus by Robby Payne of Chrome Unboxed at CES 2017.

item.title: More Details on the new Acer Chromebook 15 Models
item.description: This interview from Lon Seidman with an Acer representative provides some more detail on the upcoming Acer Chromebook 15, that is being showcased at CES 2015.

item.title: Acer Chromebook 15 Introduced at CES 2015
item.description: Acer showcased this new Chromebook at CES 2015, which currently takes place in Las Vegas: the Acer Chromebook 15.

item.title: Hands-on the Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 at IFA 2014
item.description: A short hands-on video of the upcoming Tegra K1 powered HP Chromebook 14 recored by Steve Paine at IFA 2014.

item.title: Hands-on the Toshiba Chromebook 2 at IFA 2014
item.description: There are 2 main criticisms of Chromebooks in terms of hardware: too little RAM and low quality displays. An upcoming Chromebook that could fill this gap is the Toshiba Chromebook 2 CB30-B.

item.title: Samsung Chromebook Showcased at ARM TechCon
item.description: The new Samsung Chromebook seems to be a huge success. It currently ranks first on Amazon.com's laptop best seller list and is temporarily out of stock.

item.title: 10-inch Sunlike Netbook Running Android Ice Cream Sandwich
item.description: This netbook by Sunlike, recently showcased at China Sourcing Fair, is powered by a 1.2GHz Boxchip A10 CPU, comes with 1GB RAM and runs Android.

item.title: Future Samsung Chromebook with Coreboot Boots Ridiculously Fast

item.title: Low Price EPC1029D Android Netbook Spotted at CeBIT
